### Steps to reproduce

My PC can not connect the Internet . when I open the powershell.  it slowly ,because it will connection ctldl.windowsupdate.com.  

### Expected behavior

```console
add parameter or env ,can stop connection ctldl.windowsupdate.com.
```


### Actual behavior

```console
it always connection ctldl.windowsupdate.com every times when startup.
```

none

none

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
> ctldl.windowsupdate.com CTL is certificate trust list. See https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/an-automatic-updater-of-untrusted-certificates-is-available-for-windows-vista-windows-server-2008-windows-7-and-windows-server-2008-r2-117bc163-d9e0-63ad-5a79-e61f38be8b77 It is not PowerShell related. It is Windows related. Since PowerShell exe and dll-s are signed and standard PowerShell modules are signed too Windows automatically checks these signs.
An automatic updater of untrusted certificates is available for Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, and Windows Server 2008 R2
Describes an update for Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, and Windows Server 2008 R2. This update adds the public key or signature hash of known untrusted certificates to CTL.
